content: handknit golf club covers made by marni the number of stripes designates which club it is i made three covers - for 1 3 and 4 clubs materials and pattern info yarn lion brand wool-ease i chose eggplant and sienna 2 skeins in the main color and 1 skein in the second color you will have a lot of the second color left over notions large pompon maker i made one out of cardboard by tracing a large jar cover see drops technique tutorial video here needles size 8 us double pointed needles gauge 16 sts x 24 row = 4x4 inch square on size 8 us needles abbreviations k knit p purl directions begin ribbing 1 cast on and evenly divide 36 stitches on 3 needles 12 sts per needle 2 proceed in a k2 p2 ribbing for about 9 or 10 inches 3 on the last rib row you will increase by 9 i did this by making a stitch on the 2nd knit stitch of the pattern so for example k k+1 p p k k+1 p p - all the way around = 45 sts main body 1 continue in stockinette stitch through row 35 knit every row when you use double pointed needles follow the pattern below to add stripes add stripes along the way for the #1 club 1 stripe of 2nd color knit 2 row in second color for 1 stripe on row 18 & 19 for the #3 club 3 stripes knit 2 row in second color for 3 stripes on row 12 & 13 18 & 19 24 & 25 for the #4 club 4 stripes knit 2 row in second color for 4 stripes on row 6 & 7 12 & 13 18 & 19 24 & 25 © 2015 marni reecer all rights reserved for questions and support please email info@marnimadeit com handknit golf club covers made by marni optional #5 & #7 clubs for the #5 club for the #5 club 5 stripes knit 2 row in second color for 5 stripes on row 10 & 11 14 & 15 18 & 19 22 & 23 26 & 27 for the #7 club 7 stripes knit 2 row in second color for 7 stripes on row 10 & 11 13 & 14 16 & 17 19 & 20 22 & 23 25 & 26 28 & 29 2 row 36 k2 decrease and repeat around = 23 sts 3 cut a long strand of yarn thread the needle and pull through all stitches weave in ends 4 make a large pompon and attach it to the top of the golf club cover with careful stitching pompoms i used both colors in my pompons but you could choose to just use the second color the instructions for making these can be found online there are quite a few videos that show how to make pompons using your own cut out pieces of cardboard which is what i did following
